name: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
desc: Constants that can be used as keys to retrieve information about a font descriptor from its variation axis dictionary.

items.name: static let identifier: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
items.desc: The axis identifier value as a number object.

items.name: static let minimumValue: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
items.desc: The minimum axis value as a number object.

items.name: static let maximumValue: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
items.desc: The maximum axis value as a number object.

items.name: static let defaultValue: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
items.desc: The default axis value as a number object.
